alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 11:25AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through NOON EDT... At 1124 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brookhaven National Laboratory, or near Wading River, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middle Island, Wading River, Rocky Point, Calverton, Brookhaven National Laboratory, Ridge, Miller Place, Sound Beach and Shoreham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
